{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Router with Smart Speaker |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.asus.com/us/Networking/Lyra-Voice/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_Lyra_Voice |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = Lyra |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Voice |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC22003R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, wireless speaker system, mesh node |sernum = 90IG04N0-MA1G00 |fcc_id = MSQ-RTHU00 |icid = 3568A-RTHU00 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4019;IPQ4019, 0VV, NE736DQ9, E073600; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 716 <!-- 716 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF2G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16EP-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8072; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;3.14;;
|exp_if_types = none
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.37 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, 256QAM, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.2, Speaker, Alexa, AiMesh, AiProtection |addchip = 2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY2623L;;2; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; ,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;CSR;CSR8811;CSR, 8811, A12U, 818MX6;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/15/2018 |estreldate = 01/08/2018 |estprice = 229 |upc = 192876039977 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07M8T3RMR |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 400 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 400 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9886;Q, QCA9886, 0VV, NK749LVL, K074904; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL |rad3txchains = 2 |rad3rxchains = 2 |rad3sstreams = 2 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad3ac = 867 |rad3n = 400 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com 2-in-1 Smart Assistant and AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh WiFi Router :Two 8W Stereo Speakers, with Built-in Amazon Alexa, :AiProtection network security powered by Trend Micro
*[http://www.apkmirror.com/apk/asustek-computer-inc/asus-lyra/ ''ASUS Lyra app'' on '''APKMirror'''] :Android ASUS Lyra App v1.0.0.0.20 :Compatibility Models: :*[[ASUS Lyra]] (MAP-AC2200) :*[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] (MAP-AC1300) :*[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] (MAP-AC1750) :*ASUS Lyra Voice (AC2200)
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://promos.asus.com/US/PR_2019/ces_Lyra_Voice/index.html ''ASUS Announces Lyra Voice'' on '''Promos ASUS'''] *[http://edgeup.asus.com/2018/lyra-voice-lyra-trio-bring-alexa-functionality-affordable-flexibility-to-your-mesh-network/ ''ASUS Lyra Voice and Lyra Trio'' on '''EdgeUp ASUS'''] *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family ''CES 2018 - ASUS Lyra Home Wi-Fi System'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/107730138-post7.html On '''HardwareZone''' forums] (Maylyn's post) *[http://wl500g.info/entry.php?10135-ASUS-Blue-Cave-amp-Lyra On '''wl500g.info''' forums] (Omega's blog) *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/2076-asus-lyra-mesh-wifi/ On '''OpenITforum''' forums] (House's posts)
==Notes== <small> *'''Whole Home WiFi Range''' — Tri-band mesh network compatible with Lyra :series ensures a strong connection in every corner of your home *'''Simple, Intuitive Access to Smart Devices''' — Built-in, hands-free help from :Amazon Alexa answers your questions and controls smart home devices *'''Rich and Powerful Sound''' — Exclusive audio technology lets you enjoy your :music in stereo sound with deeper bass and a wider frequency range *'''Complete Network Security for Your Family''' — Lifetime free AiProtection :powered by Trend Micro protects all connected devices, IoT appliances *'''You’re in Control''' — The ASUS Lyra app enables PC-free setup, network :management and diagnostics, and notifies you about any problems </small>
==See also== *[[ASUS Blue Cave]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Blue-Cave/ PPage] :128MB Flash, 512MB RAM, [[Intel]] Wi-Fi, IFTTT, IoT • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/05/29/asus-blue-cave-wireless-router/ Computex 2017] *[[ASUS Lyra]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) + QCA9886 (2T2R 5GHz) :*[[ASUS HiveSpot]] - ''AC2200 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] - ''AC1300 Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra-Mini/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 @710MHz Quad Core (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) :*[[ASUS HiveDot]] - ''AC1300 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] - ''AC1750 Dual Band Mesh Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family CES 2018] *ASUS Lyra Voice - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Router with Smart Speaker''
[[Category:English Documentation]]
